Package io.dapr.utils

Class NetworkUtils

java.lang.Object
io.dapr.utils.NetworkUtils
public final class NetworkUtils
extends java.lang.Object
Utility methods for network, internal to Dapr SDK.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void waitForSocket​(java.lang.String host, int port, int timeoutInMilliseconds)
    Tries to connect to a socket, retrying every 1 second.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • waitForSocket

      public static void waitForSocket​(java.lang.String host, int port, int timeoutInMilliseconds) throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Tries to connect to a socket, retrying every 1 second.
      Parameters:
      host - Host to connect to.
      port - Port to connect to.
      timeoutInMilliseconds - Timeout in milliseconds to give up trying.
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - If retry is interrupted.
